content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, thank you for coming to see the apartment. The rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is negotiable. What are your thoughts on the price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I would like to know what the rental price is before we start negotiating.

I am a student, so I am looking for a low-cost apartment. I am also very responsible and dependable, so I would like to have a good relationship with my landlord.

Can you give me an idea of what the rental price is?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I understand your concerns as a student looking for a low-cost apartment. However, the rental price for this 25 square meter apartment is non-negotiable. It is currently set at €500 per month. I hope this information is helpful for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I understand. However, I would like to negotiate the rental price. I am willing to make a lower offer.

Can you give me an idea of what a reasonable offer would be?

I am also looking for a long-term rental agreement. How long are you willing to offer me the apartment for?

Thanks.

Max
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Max, I understand your desire for a lower rental price. However, I am not willing to negotiate the price any further. The rental price of €500 per month is fair for this 25 square meter apartment in the city center.

Regarding the length of the rental agreement, I am willing to offer a one-year lease with the possibility of renewal for another one-year term.
name: Heinrich Heine
